subject: Simsonn Plus Connection Issue
description_text:
Hello, I bought simsonn pedals, but clutch and gas are not recognized and
brake is being activated without being touched. Can you please help.

conversations.body_text: Hi Minh-Dan Luong,     Please uninstall the old version from your computer and install the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1 from the provided link. After connecting the device, if you see a message saying “Version too old, not supported” or Simsonn Flasher mode, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-plus.sfu to update the firmware. Once the update is complete, make sure to recalibrate the pedals, as they will not function properly in games without calibration.        https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BAdSWa1bxmbPksj9Hlzuo8bl7_bM8ixr/view?usp=drive_link

I’m sorry, I have simsonn pro, not plus, so this did not work

On Wed, Oct 1, 2025 at 3:11 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Minh-Dan Luong,  You can use FreeJoy to restore the pedals. I will provide you with the necessary recovery files and a detailed step-by-step guide.      After connecting the device, click “Load Config from File” and select the .cfg file I attached. Then click “Write Config to Device” to write the configuration. Finally, click “Read Config from Device” to verify that the settings have been successfully restored.       https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

I was unable to connect the device

On Sun, Oct 5, 2025 at 8:51 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Minh-Dan Luong,  You can use Simsonn Manager 2.1.0 to restore the firmware.  Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.  After the update, the pedals should work normally and allow you to recalibrate them.

I get this error message when trying to install 2.1.0

On Sun, Oct 5, 2025 at 4:31 PM service@simsonn.com

I think something is wrong with control box since none of the software can
connect with it

wrote:

> I get this error message when trying to install 2.1.0
>
> On Sun, Oct 5, 2025 at 4:31 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Minh-Dan Luong,  We have released SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. Please download and install this version first, then go to Settings → Update and manually update the firmware by selecting the plus.sfu file.
